QuestData.Title: Reason to Worry
QuestData.Description: These appear to be orders dispatched to the overseers at the ruins from a superior in the Shatterspear War Camp. Most of the document contains negligible strategic value, but a couple lines stick out to you.$B$B"We captured another night elf spying on our operation. She has been taken back to the camp to be tortured for more information. Keep an eye out for additional spies - we cannot afford for our operation to be compromised."$B$BThe Lieutenant will surely want this information.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Shatterspear Orders to Lieutenant Morra Starbreeze at the Ruins of Mathystra.
QuestData.RewardText: "Another?" They have more than one. I will not leave any of my people to be tortured, we must act quickly.
